title: Jojo's blues
creator_credit: Churchill Films, Jane Warrenbrand and Peter Wallach
brief_description: Tells the story of Teddy’s dangerous initiation into a gang led by Jojo and Scat. When Jojo has a close escape he tries to bribe Teddy into keeping the fiasco a secret, but Teddy refuses not only the money, but also membership in the club. “I’d like to be friends with you guys,” he says, “but the price is just not right.” Animated.
